Package net.replaceitem.reconfigure.api.widget

Interface WidgetBuilder<SELF extends WidgetBuilder<SELF,T>,T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilder<SELF>, CheckboxWidgetBuilder, ChipListWidgetBuilder, ColorPickerWidgetBuilder, CustomWidgetBuilder<T>, CyclingButtonWidgetBuilder<T>, SliderWidgetBuilder<SELF,T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilderImpl, CheckboxWidgetBuilderImpl, ChipListWidgetBuilderImpl, ColorPickerWidgetBuilderImpl, CustomWidgetBuilderImpl, CyclingButtonWidgetBuilderImpl, EditBoxWidgetBuilderImpl, SliderWidgetBuilderImpl, SliderWidgetBuilderImpl.DoubleSliderWidgetBuilder, SliderWidgetBuilderImpl.IntSliderWidgetBuilder, TextFieldWidgetBuilderImpl, WidgetBuilderImpl
public interface WidgetBuilder<SELF extends WidgetBuilder<SELF,T>,T>

    Builds the widget and the property.

    Sets the display name of the widget as rendered in the config screen.

  • Method Details

    • displayName

      SELF displayName(net.minecraft.text.Text displayName)
      Sets the display name of the widget as rendered in the config screen. When not set, defaults to a translatable text with key reconfigure.property.[namespace].[propertyname].
      Parameters:
      displayName - The display name text
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining

    • tooltip

      SELF tooltip(net.minecraft.text.Text tooltip)
      Sets the tooltip text for the widget. This is shown when hovering over the property display name in the config widget.
      Parameters:
      tooltip - The tooltip text
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining

    • tooltip

      SELF tooltip()
      Enabled the tooltip for the widget. The text of the tooltip will default to a translatable text with key reconfigure.property.[namespace].[propertyname].tooltip.
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining

    • build

      Property<T> build()
      Builds the widget and the property. The built widget and property is automatically added to the config tab on which this builder was created.
      Returns:
      The built property
